source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a street-level shot of a yellow building with light green shutters, characteristic of New Orleans' French Quarter. A person and a black dog are on the sidewalk in front of the building. A classic black lamppost and parked cars complete the urban scene.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a street-level shot of a yellow building with light green shutters, characteristic of New Orleans' French Quarter. A person and a black dog are on the sidewalk in front of the building. A classic black lamppost and parked cars complete the urban scene.

generated_critique: This caption describes a static scene, failing to capture any of the motion present in the video. It focuses on the appearance of the building and other background elements, which violates the instruction to prioritize the subject's movement. The caption should have described the primary action, which is a person walking a black dog on a leash from the left side of the frame to the right. It misses the specific, chronological details of their movement, such as the dog briefly stopping to sniff the base of the black lamppost before the person gently tugs the leash, prompting them both to continue walking out of the frame to the right. Furthermore, it neglects to mention the secondary motion of cars driving past on the street in the background, which adds to the urban environment's dynamic quality. The description should be rewritten to focus entirely on these actions rather than the static architectural details.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: A person walks a black dog on a leash from the left side of the frame to the right, creating a dynamic scene in the bustling New Orleans' French Quarter. The dog briefly stops to sniff the base of a classic black lamppost, but the person gently tugs the leash, encouraging them to continue their walk. In the background, cars drive past, adding to the lively urban atmosphere.
